name: Park Builder
description:
Hi there, Mini Mayor here and we need you help. The citizens of Crestfallen are very unhappy with how things are right now. The need a place where they can relax. Where they can escape from there daily routine. They need a park. Can you build a park that pleases the citizens of Crestfallen?

Features:
  • Sandbox Mode: Build you dream park with no building cost and no restrictions.  
Planned:
  • Scenario Mode: Build a park that the follows the mayors guidelines.
